title: People can't hear me when I use speakerphone pixel 4xl
content:
When I make calls and switch to speakerphone the other person can't hear me at all. They get no sound coming through. I tested my microphones using the camera to record video and the recorder app. Both record sound and can play back, so I don't think it's a hardware issue.
How can I get speakerphone to work properly?
Thanks, Sean
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
